controls.title: Verify if curl is installed
controls.desc: Check if the curl package is installed on the system

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: Check if the curl package is installed on the system

controls.code:
control 'package-01' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'Verify if curl is installed'
  desc 'Check if the curl package is installed on the system'

  describe package('curl') do
    it { should be_installed }
  end
end

results.code_desc: System Package curl is expected to be installed

controls.title: Verify if ubuntu user exists
controls.desc: Ensure the user ubuntu is present on the system

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: Ensure the user ubuntu is present on the system

controls.code:
control 'user-01' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'Verify if ubuntu user exists'
  desc 'Ensure the user ubuntu is present on the system'

  describe user('ubuntu') do
    it { should exist }
  end

  describe user('abc') do
    it { should exist }
  end
end

results.code_desc: User ubuntu is expected to exist
User abc is expected to exist

controls.title: Verify if ubuntu package exists
controls.desc: Ensure the user ubuntu is present on the system

descriptions.label: default
descriptions.data: Ensure the user ubuntu is present on the system

controls.code:
control 'package-02' do
  impact 1.0
  title 'Verify if ubuntu package exists'
  desc 'Ensure the user ubuntu is present on the system'

  describe package('dummy') do
    it { should be_installed }
  end
end

results.code_desc: System Package dummy is expected to be installed
results.message: expected that `System Package dummy` is installed
